price: Itulah orang-orang yang membeli kehidupan dunia dengan (kehidupan) akhirat, maka tidak akan diringankan siksa mereka dan mereka tidak akan ditolong.
arabic: أُوْلَٰٓئِكَ ٱلَّذِينَ ٱشۡتَرَوُاْ ٱلۡحَيَوٰةَ ٱلدُّنۡيَا بِٱلۡأٓخِرَةِۖ فَلَا يُخَفَّفُ عَنۡهُمُ ٱلۡعَذَابُ وَلَا هُمۡ يُنصَرُونَ

version.title: Indonesian Translation - King Fahd Complex
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by approved Committee by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: ulāika alladhīna ish'tarawū al-ḥayata al-dun'yā bil-ākhirati falā yukhaffafu ʿanhumu al-ʿadhābu walā hum yunṣarūna
